jcr:root.jcr:description: Block can include background with either image or color. There is a rich text area to author a heading for the section. Author is then able to author image with text below. The image can be linked out and there are two rich text editors for the text (one for title and one for description). Author is able to add multiple image/text combinations which will then line up horizontally.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Image Block With Text
